spell.name: Envenom
entries: Choose a creature you can see within range to inflict with a magical poison. The target takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, it becomes {@condition poisoned} for the spell's duration.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target must make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. It takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage on a failed saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on that target.
A {@i lesser restoration} spell cast on the target ends this spell early.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.
